name: Coco-Goats
declaringWar: Only when days be darker than the darkest night, may a qilin be compelled to fight.
attacked: Could we maybe... find a peaceful resolution instead...? Never mind, doesn't matter...
introduction: We are the Coco-Goats. Want some Milk?
neutralNo: Sorry you went to all this trouble...but oo
hateNo: I appreciate the thought, but... No
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: Trade offer I recive Money, you recive Coco-Goat Milk
